X-Yahoo-Profile: shadowess_azogoth

KitKat::

She had crawled and dragged herself from the darkest, blackest 
corners of the pit before. But this time, she wondered if the Matrix 
was calling for her spark.  She was draggin her left leg behind her 
since it was broken at the hip joint. In wolf mode, it made crawling 
under the bushes harder.  She was leaking mech fluid from her side 
wounds and had been for some time. Her spark was functioning at only 
25%.  Her audio sencors were hearing only static. Her optics were 
blinking and could see only 5 feet infront of her.  Her sence of 
smell was down to about 15%.  She was covered in rust from head to 
tail.  She didn't know how much longer she would last.  She finally 
stopped as she could smell bots near by. But since she was barely 
fuctioning, she couldn't tel if it was maximal or predacon.  She 
could only hope it was predacon.  She crawled untill her head banged 
into something. It was the side pannel of a base. She crawled along 
the outside untill she reached what she thought was the front doors.  
Being too tired and worn out to knock, she banged her the side of her 
head against the doors, "Open up. I need help. Please, somebot help 
me."  She fell to her side and started to shake.  She hoped that 
death would be swift and painless. However, she was still awake and 
alive. "Please, help me." her voice getting weaker. However, she 
would wish death would take her when she found out it was the MAXIMAL 
base she walked up to.
